analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/31/0x573a9a3384a21fb4e1d1f18c6f90efb8dc947fa3.sol:
	Contract SimulacrumToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x573a9a3384a21fb4e1d1f18c6f90efb8dc947fa3.sol#210)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x573a9a3384a21fb4e1d1f18c6f90efb8dc947fa3.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/31/0x573a9a3384a21fb4e1d1f18c6f90efb8dc947fa3.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x573a9a3384a21fb4e1d1f18c6f90efb8dc947fa3.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
